name: Improved Polymorph
text:
Cost: 2 AP, 4 mana, 1 signature.
Choose an enemy character within range and transform it into a tiny, harmless animal. While in this form, the enemy can only perform Move actions. If the enemy takes damage, the effect ends.

When your turn begins, roll 2 dice. If their total value is less than the transformed enemy's current HP, the effect ends.

Increase the size of your mana pool by 2.
